articles.author: Gianrigo Marletta and Lucie Aubourg
articles.title: Europe's space telescope launches to explore universe's dark mysteries - The Jakarta Post
articles.description: By capturing light that has taken 10 billion years to reach Earth's vicinity, the map will also offer a new view of the 13.8-billion-year-old universe's history.
articles.content:
Europe's Euclid space telescope blasted off Saturday, kicking off a first-ever mission to shed light on two of the universe's greatest mysteries: dark energy and dark matter.

articles.author: Elizabeth Howell
articles.title: What's next for Europe's Euclid 'dark universe' telescope after stunning SpaceX launch? - Space.com
articles.description: The long journey is just beginning.
articles.content:
CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla. — A new space observatory is flying across the void after a dramatic launch atop a SpaceX rocket Saturday (July 1), but its journey has just begun.
